name: ZEZ
description:
A slight RTS strategy survival game

The theme duality is expressed by having minions turn into you buildings and visa versa

WARNING: it's not polished 

Comment for feedback or questions

Controls:

shift to select multiple minions

click and hold for box select

left click for single minions

right click to deselect

pan with mouse by holding down wheel or move with WASD

Q and E to transform

1 to select all gens

2 to select all rockets

3 to select all makers

4 to select all turrets

The buttons on the right are to select what you want the minion to do

ex: when a maker in building form is selected you have the options to pick what minion you want it to make.
